overview: A couple enters an island in search of land that belongs to them, but the hostile jungle environment ends up driving them away. Maria is left alone and walks through the jungle until she inadvertently comes across an old house inhabited by an islander who will teach her about the place and about love.
tagline: Maria gets lost on an island, looking for a way to return, she meets an islander who will teach her about the place and about love.
title: Las Posibilidades de una Isla
